visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Tokyo' with data [7.0, 6.9, 9.5, 14.5, 18.2, 21.5, 25.2, 23.3, 18.3, 13.9, 9.6] and 'London' with data [3.9, 4.2, 5.7, 8.5, 11.9, 15.2, 17.0, 16.6, 14.2, 10.3, 6.6]. The chart should use custom colors for each series and include additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes two data series: 'Tokyo' and 'London', each with their respective temperature data for each month. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The chart uses custom colors for each series and includes additional configurations such as chart margins, background color, and legend settings to ensure a visually appealing and informative chart.
